title: Square, ca. 1947
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed on plain weave
description: In center, the Statue of Liberty, a circle composed of small stars and a maps of the United States. In border, medallions at corners showing: George Washington; an eagle with a shield flag; portrait of Abraham Lincoln; and the Capitol Building, Washington, D.C. Printed in blue on white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Square, ca. 1947.Medium: cotton
Technique: printed on plain weave. Gift of Caroline Ferriday. 1947-73-1.
